title: building py-yt now fails with cannot depend twice error
body:
running `spack spec py-yt` now gives:

```
spack spec py-yt
Input spec
--------------------------------
py-yt

Normalized
--------------------------------
py-yt
    ^py-cython
        ^python@2.7:2.8,3.4:
            ^bzip2
            ^ncurses
            ^openssl
                ^zlib@1.0.4:
            ^readline
            ^sqlite
    ^py-ipython
        ^py-pygments
            ^py-setuptools@17.1:
    ^py-matplotlib
        ^freetype@2.3:
            ^libpng@1.2:
            ^pkg-config@0.9.0:
        ^py-cycler@0.9:
            ^py-six@1.9.0:
        ^py-dateutil@1.1:
        ^py-mock
            ^py-pbr
        ^py-nose
        ^py-numpy@1.6:
        ^py-pyparsing
        ^py-pytz
        ^qhull@2012.1:
            ^cmake@2.6:
    ^py-sympy

Concretized
--------------------------------
==> Error: Cannot depend on 'py-pillow^binutils@2.26:^bison^bzip2@1.0.6%gcc@6.2.1 arch=linux-arch-x86_64^flex^gettext@0.19:^help2man^m4^ncurses@6.0%gcc@6.2.1 arch=linux-arch-x86_64^openssl@1.0.2j%gcc@6.2.1 arch=linux-arch-x86_64^py-setuptools@25.2.0%gcc@6.2.1 arch=linux-arch-x86_64^python@2.7.13%gcc@6.2.1~tk+ucs4 arch=linux-arch-x86_64^readline@6.3%gcc@6.2.1 arch=linux-arch-x86_64^sqlite@3.8.5%gcc@6.2.1 arch=linux-arch-x86_64^zlib@1.2.10%gcc@6.2.1+pic arch=linux-arch-x86_64' twice
```

a quick git bisect reveals that this behaviour is introduced at commit 5fbab1f4b553b9ec550dfd0eef3078e7c87720aa
